snippet: Ryan Miller was the face of U.S. ice hockey during a magical run at the 2010 Vancouver Games but the goaltender had to rediscover his form to earn a spot on the Sochi Olympics squad....

headline.print_headline: Ice Hockey: Miller Eager for Shot at Redemption in Sochi
headline.main: Ice Hockey: Miller Eager for Shot at Redemption in Sochi

lead_paragraph: Ryan Miller was the face of U.S. ice hockey during a magical run at the 2010 Vancouver Games but the goaltender had to rediscover his form to earn a spot on the Sochi Olympics squad.
